ygData.subject: Re: Hello Everyone!
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome! Glad to see you have a warrior. Now that Ompa is leaving (/em cries) EQ for RL the guild could use a warrior. Kerik Rainbow Wood Elf Druid of the 35th
ygData.messageBody:
Welcome!
Glad to see you have a warrior. Now that Ompa is leaving (/em cries)
EQ for RL the guild could use a warrior.

Kerik Rainbow
Wood Elf Druid of the 35th season

--- In EQ_rainbow@egroups.com, Maidenofiron@a... wrote:
> Hiyas! Im excited to be a new member of this emailing community!! :)
> Hmm, for those who are interested in newcomers, I might as well
introduce
> myself a bit. hehe :D
> Lets see.. I have played EQ for a bout a year now, beginning on
Nameless
> then switching to Rodcet around April of this year :) At the
moment my two
> main characters on Rodcet are Ivymayden D'Zephyr ~ 34 Woodelf
Warrior and
> Melalle ~ 15 Dark Elf Romancer. (but im a good witch!) among a few
other
> chars I got bored with hehe. I recently discovered Mystic Alliance
and was
> overjoyed! I had no idea there was such a guild on EQ!! These past
few weeks
> have been some of the best since I joined :D Ok, ill draw the
line
on the
> intro here! Im looking forward to meeting the Rainbow crew!
>
> *Hugz*
> ~Lori~
